caption.p: Top: Pharmacokinetic model for favipiravir in non‐human primates; bottom: predicted drug concentrations at D7 for three levels of dosing regimens and comparisons with drug half‐maximal effective concentration for various emerging viruses. CCHFV, Crimea Congo haemorrhagic fever virus; EBOV, Ebola virus; JUNV, Junin virus; LAV, Lassa fever virus; MARV, Marburg virus; RVFV, Rift valley fever virus; YFV, Yellow fever virus. Reproduced from ref. 8.
